caption.p: Additional file 2: Figure S1. A map of alpine plant communities in the study area, which include Japanese stone pine ( Pinus pumila) communities (shown in blue), snowbed grassland communities (green), and alpine fellfield communities (orange). The three plant communities were extracted from a digitized vegetation map provided by the Ministry of the Environment of Japan ( http://www.biodic.go.jp/trialSystem/EN/info/vg67.html, accessed in September 2012).
